name: Tomasz Lee

Demonstrated expertise in applying Agile methodologies to deliver high-quality solutions efficiently. Strong knowledge of development tools like **VisualStudio**, and experience working with DDD principles to enhance maintainability of the codebase. Proven track record of successfully leading development projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and optimizing performance of applications.
